text:
Looks promising... but it creates the inverse problem: I need to type my instance's URL, unless it's in the predefined list, which is already a bit too long for my taste.
I don't know if this can be avoided. I am always logged in into my instance, so maybe this leaves an exploitable trace in my browser? Though I'd almost prefer that it doesn't (for privacy reasons).
